data.title: The Marine Mollusca of Greece an up-to-date, systematic catalogue, documented with bibliographic and pictorial references
data.meta_description: Access 135+ million publications and connect with 20+ million researchers. Join for free and gain visibility by uploading your research.
data.text:
The Marine Mollusca of Greece (by January 2023)- an updated, systematic catalogue, documented with bibliographic and pictorial references (1)

November 2023

·

593 Reads

·

2 Citations

This survey provides an updated, systematic catalogue documented with bibliographic and pictorial references on the extant marine Mollusca of the Hellenic Seas by January 2023. Ιt adds 55 extra species for the area and 3 new species for science to the previous taxa register. It incοrporates 1479 species belonging to 271 families and referred to in 196 publications. The up-to-date nomenclature is based on the WoRMS Database.

View

Description of a new species of the genus Raphitoma Bellardi, 1847 from the Mediterranean Sea (Mollusca, Neogastropoda, Conoidea, Raphitomidae)

August 2022

·

829 Reads

·

4 Citations

Constantinos Kontadakis

·

Thanasis Manousis

The genus Raphitoma Bellardi, 1847 is widely known in the Mediterranean Sea with about 40 species and some still undescribed. One of them is here identified as a new species on morphological characters based on 92 specimens.

View

Description of Raphitoma minae sp. nov. (Mollusca, Gastropoda, Raphitomidae) from the Mediterranean (Aegean Sea, Greece) (4)

April 2024

·

207 Reads

·

1 Citation

Constantinos Kontadakis

·

Panayotis Ovalis

·

Giannis Zaminos

·

[...]

·

Leonidas Vardakas

A new species of Raphitoma Bellardi, 1847 from the Hellenic waters of the Aegean Sea is here described based on 13 specimens. Raphitoma minae is identified by its protoconch and teleoconch characters. It belongs to a group of species that have glossy surface of the teleoconch, and paucispiral protoconch suggestive of a lecithotrophic larval development. RESUME Une nouvelle espève de Raphitoma Bellardi, 1847 des eaux Hellenniques de la mer Égée est décrite d'aprés 13 spécimens. Raphitoma minae est identifiée par les caratères de sa protoconche et de sa téléoconche. La protoconche est paucispirale ce qui suggère un dévelopement larvaire lécithotrophique.

View
